Package com.cafean.client.ui.swing.accordion

Class NodeButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • com.cafean.client.ui.swing.accordion.NodeButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    public class NodeButton
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    The button used to render model nodes an Accordion component. Each NodeButton maintains a state as to whether it is
    • expanded
    • highlighted
    • pressed
    • selected
    These values determine how the button is painted.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getIcon

        public javax.swing.Icon getIcon()
        Returns the icon associated with the button. This is retrieved from the value passed into the constructor if and only if the value extends AccordionNode.

      • getAncillaryIcon

        public javax.swing.Icon getAncillaryIcon()
        Returns the ancillary icon associated with the button. This is retrieved from the value passed into the constructor if and only if the value extends AccordionNode.

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Returns the text from the value passed to the button at instantiation. If the value extends AccordionNode, the value is the result of AccordionNode.getLabel(). Otherwise, the Component.toString() of the value is returned.

      • getToolTipText
